conbody.p: Your document may contain redlining marks. Not to overlook them, you can find all occurrences of redlining marks in your document.

li.p: To move to the next redlining in your document, click the Find Next Redlining button on the toolbar or choose Redlining Find Next Redlining .
To move to the previous redlining in your document, click the Find Previous Redlining button on the toolbar or choose Redlining Find Previous Redlining .
